## JsPlumbInstance.\_finaliseConnection() method

Adds the connection to the backing model, fires an event if necessary and then redraws. This is a package-private method, not intended to be called by external code.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
_finaliseConnection(jpc: Connection, params?: any, originalEvent?: Event): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  jpc | [Connection](./core.connection.md) | Connection to finalise |
|  params | any |  |
|  originalEvent | Event | Optional original event that resulted in the creation of this connection.  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
